title: Did Australia plan to kill millions of wild cats using poisoned sausage?
subtitle: An article from The New York Times in April 2019 re-emerged the Australian Government ' s endangered species strategy years ago.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Australian Government ' s Threat Species Strategy aims to kill 2 million wild cats by 2020, and uses to a large extent the bait of hot dogs with lethal poison.
